text: tamange nivesvalinda, tamange vastunvalinda, (asadharanaye) pitamam karanu læba, (makkave sita) hijrat kara pæmini (muhajirvarungen vu) duppatuntada, (eyin kotasak æta). ovun allahge varaprasadayanda, (ohuge) suddha vu somnasada atkara gænime adahasin (tamange panada, vastuvada parityaga kara) allahtada ohuge dutayatada, udav karamin sitinnaha. movunma sadikun (namæti satya visvasavantayinya)
